name: Weekly Game Jam #150 - AZRAEL
description:
Hello friends!

This is a submission for the weekly game jam #150 with the theme "you are the enemy". You are Azrael, a color-hating evil wizard that wants to take revenge.  A powerful spell book from your great grandfather might come in handy for that operation...

It is not a very extensive game and it has no real challenge; instead it is a fun little project based on cute drawings and a mixture of drawing and pixelart. 

All assets (code, sound, drawings) are done by myself, no pre-made assets were made or used - all 100% self-made, the way a game jam was intended to be done :)

Fun facts: There is actually such a thing as Chromophobia (the fear of colors) and Azrael is the name of Gargamel's cat from the Smurfes.

PS: If you like the game, feel free to read the DevLog. I always write DevLogs for all my Game Jam games and they are a great way for looking behind the scenes.

Updates (28-05-2020): 

  • Issue with a non-working menu button fixed
  • Increased sound volume during the intro of the game
